text: The Tangedco, Mettur Electricity Distribution Circle, will conduct a power consumers’ grievances day meeting at the office of the Superintending Engineer on February 18. Forms for representing grievances are available at the Tangedco branch offices and the offices of the executive engineers. The grievances will be discussed and action initiated at the meeting, an official press release of the Tangedco said.
title: Tangedco grievances redress day
